plot: Frank tries to cavort the holy crowd when Mac discovers a water stain on Paddy's wall that closely resembles the Virgin Mary.

When Mac discovers a water stain to be shaped like the Virgin Mary, Frank decides this as an idea to exploit this 'miracle' and make money off it. And while the gang tries to get a priest to help make this miracle look more legit, Dee runs into an old high school friend which had a crush on her, in which she tries to win back.—James Hake
